item.title: An attempt to predict the Madness
item.description: This past weekend has not been kind to many brackets. My bracket right now ranks in the 72.5 percentile after the first weekend, a shock after being last after day one. That doesnâ€™t make me feel right but something is up when your bracket jumps from last to above the majority. library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.2 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.
